Usually problems along the lines of "crawl ends after only a few crawled 
files with no obvious error" are due to problems with the crawl's 
defined scope (regardless of the method of launch). Have you customized 
the scope in a way that perhaps deeper material along the paths you are 
crawling is being ruled out, by pattern, site, hops-count, or something 
else?

If you it in fact crawled anything, your method of launching must be 
working.

The mode of launching has changed a lot for 2.0.0, so your code would 
likely need some updating. OTOH, more options for remote-controlling the 
crawling 'engine' without any Web UI at all are available, so it might 
be an interesting upgrade for you from any 1.X version.

Still, if it's working for you *except* ending faster than expected, 
it's probably a configuration issue rather than something a new version 
would fix.

- Gordon @ IA
